Strings.Text: There is a foul stench in the \narea.{pause}{clear}They must have battled it all out \nhere.{pause}
His wind pipe has been ripped \nout.{pause}{clear}They appear to have been killed \nnot as food but as enemy.{pause}
There is still smell of smoke in \nthe air.{pause}{clear}Not much time has passed since \nthey were killed.{pause}
Appears to have died from a \nbullet.{pause}{clear}It is the body of a citizen.{pause}
He is dead, soaked in his own \nblood.{pause}
It's the barricade which isolates \nthe control base.{pause}{clear}The is no reason to go back.{pause}
You have found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
